QuestData.Title: A Unified Front
QuestData.Description: From here, it will take our combined efforts to proceed.$b$bAbove us, Varos hides behind an impenetrable shield. To reach him, you must defeat the Centrifuge Constructs that power his shield.$b$bWe can each provide you with drakes from our respective flights to help you reveal him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Belgaristrasz wants you to destroy 10 Centrifuge Constructs to bring down Varos' shield. You then must defeat Varos Cloudstrider.
QuestData.RewardText: It is as I had hoped, $r. We work well together.$b$bMay our continued cooperation be enough to overcome the challenges that yet await!
